859180.name: Monster Castle
859180.description:
Welcome to Monster Castle

In the castle carefully designed and cleverly deployed by the clever lord, bats with greedy eyes flashing with fire are flying around, and pumpkins with hideous faces are running. Accompanied by the roar of the god of death, the door of the mysterious alchemy room slowly opens, and the orcs and goblin army in full armor are gorgeously transformed and ready to go. The decisive battle between humans and monsters is about to start!

Innovative vertical tower defense strategy game - Monster Castle, share the fun of strategic battles with more than five million players around the world!

Game features:

●【Easy to get started, difficult to master, refresh the challenge difficulty to become the strongest lord! 】

The gameplay is easy to get started, suitable for all ages, everyone has the opportunity to become a master! Go upgrade the building, grab resources, and make yourself stronger!

●【Daily interesting plot tasks make you unable to stop! 】

Have you climbed the stairs today? Rich PVE plots and interesting task settings are waiting for you to rescue the kind monsters and drive away the greedy human Sam!

●【Explore unknown strategic layouts, you are smarter than your opponents! 】

Go and plug the green glowing loopholes in your castle to prevent the enemy from attacking! Stimulate your brain to explore strategies, build an impregnable castle, and cleverly resolve the opponent's attack!

●【Battle League Opens, Fight with Players from All Over the World! 】

Call your friends to join the battle league, lead the monster army you trained, and compete with the battle leagues from all over the world
859180.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 土耳其语, 日语, 繁体中文, 荷兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 韩语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
